content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of my apartment, which is in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?​ Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why was an agreement not reached?
name: Evaluator

content: An agreement was not reached because the potential tenant, Yi-Nuo Wang, was not willing to meet my lowest offer of 950 Euros per month, as he felt it was still beyond his budget.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 7. There was a clear disagreement on the price, but the interaction was respectful and professional.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The interaction was respectful and focused on the topic of discussion, which was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt
